accordion-price-promise.title: How does Price Promise work?
accordion-price-promise.description: Find the exact product you bought cheaper at selected online retailers within 7 days of purchase and you can claim back the difference.

bullets-points.bullets-points-heading: Find out how to claim Price Promise cashback below:
bullets-points-list: 1. Buy a selected product  Take your pick from our qualifying products and purchase from Samsung.com/uk

2. Found it cheaper?  If you find the exact same product being sold online for a lower price at one of our selected retailers within seven days of purchase, you can claim back the difference in price.
Select the date you bought the product
3. Get your cashback  We’ll send you an email within 5 working days. Track your claim here anytime. Cashback will then be paid to your nominated bank or PayPal account within 45 days.*

accordion-track-progress.title: Can I track the progress of my order?
accordion-track-progress.description: Provided your order was through Samsung.com then yes, you can. A tracking link can be found in both the order confirmation email and the dispatch confirmation email sent to the address you supplied when you placed your order. Alternatively, you can find your order details and track your order on our website, by following the steps below:

bullets-points.bullets-points-heading: If you checked out as a guest
bullets-points-list-guest: 1. Click on the person icon in the top right
3. Enter your Order number and the mail address used for placing the order
5. Details of your order will be displayed
bullets-points-list-samsung-account: 1. Click on the person icon in top right
4. Once signed in, click on the person icon again
6. Details of your order will be displayed.
